title: Date Calculator
description: Calculate date differences and add or subtract days, months, and years
metaDescription: Free date calculator - Add or subtract days, months, and years from a date. Calculate differences between dates, business days, and more.

info.title: About the Date Calculator
info.description: This date calculator allows you to add or subtract time from a specific date, or calculate the difference between two dates. It's useful for project planning, deadline calculation, and much more.
info.useCase1: Calculate due dates and delivery deadlines
info.useCase2: Determine project duration in business days
info.useCase3: Plan events and calculate future dates
info.useCase4: Calculate age, anniversaries, and elapsed time
